sent.orig: DCT is based on FFT (Fast Fourier Transform), so integers FFT transform must be structured firstly.
sent.trans: DCT变换采取基于FFT(fast Fourier transform)的快速算法，所以，首先寻找整数FFT变换。

sent.orig: D graphics translation transform, transform scaling, rotation transform, transform the wrong cut and symmetry transformation process.
sent.trans: 实现二维图形的平移变换、放缩变换、旋转变换、错切变换及对称变换的程序。

sent.orig: The development of time-frequency analysis has three periods: Fourier transform, short-time Fourier transform and wavelet transform.
sent.trans: 时频分析方法经历了富氏变换、短时富利叶变换、小波变换三个阶段。

sent.orig: This procedure realize orthogonal transformation images, including Fourier transform, discrete cosine transform, Walsh transform.
sent.trans: 本程序实现图像的正交变换，包括傅立叶变换，离散余弦变换，沃尔什变换。

sent.orig: The selected transform file cannot be found. Please select a different transform or uncheck Apply Transform.
sent.trans: 无法找到所选的转换文件。请选择其他转换或取消选中“应用转换”。
